author: simms1929
title: Great stay in a great location
text:
This hotel was located perfectly for our trip to the Big East basketball tournament at Madison Square Garden. Easy walk to MSG and easy walk to Times Square and even easier to the Empire State Building. The room was small - as we expected, but it was perfect for our needs. Breakfast was your standard HIE fare and there was just enough seating in the breakfast area that we didn't feel too crowded. Nice restaurants around the hotel and a good area to stay in. 36th street wasn't too busy, so traffic in front of the hotel wasn't bad. We would definitely stay here again.
Room Tip: Get a higher level for better views. See more room tips
